hero.title: The Logic Behind the Magic
hero.subtitle: My journey from curious explorer to data-driven growth architect.

start.title: The Foundation
start.desc: Started with a strong technical base in Information Technology at JIIT. Discovered a passion for the intersection of data and human behavior.

early.title: Organic Growth
early.desc: Dove into SEO and organic content. Learned how to build audiences from scratch at ABP, scaling channels to thousands of followers without ad spend.

mid.title: The Shift to Paid
mid.desc: Realized the power of amplification. Mastered Google and Meta Ads at Tradebuilder and Intertek, optimizing spend for B2B and global markets.

current.title: Scale & Innovation
current.desc: Leading growth at Pocket FM. Building automated creative testing engines and managing significant ad spends to drive global user acquisition.

cards.title: Data > Opinion
cards.desc: Every decision is backed by metrics. If you can't measure it, you can't improve it.

cards.title: Creative is the New Targeting
cards.desc: In a privacy-first world, compelling creative is the best way to find your audience.

cards.title: Full Funnel Mindset
cards.desc: Acquisition is just the start. Retention and LTV are where the real profit lies.

hero.name: Kanishk Singh
hero.description: I design paid media, CRO, and growth systems that scale revenue. Specializing in data-driven campaign optimization, funnel design, and performance analytics across B2B and B2C channels.

wip.title: Work in Progress
wip.message: Creative Lab is currently under construction. Check back soon for updates!

featuredWork.projectDesc: Launched a paid events vertical and achieved 150+ attendees with 80%+ net-new audience acquisition

paidMedia.title: Paid Media Strategy & Execution
paidMedia.desc: End-to-end campaign management across Meta, Google, and LinkedIn with focus on creative testing and audience optimization

cro.title: CRO Audits & A/B Testing
cro.desc: Data-driven conversion optimization using hypothesis testing, user research, and systematic experimentation

analytics.title: Performance Dashboards & Analytics

pocketfm.title: Ad Operations Specialist
bullets: Own Meta Ads execution across acquisition and engagement campaigns for multiple geographies
Built creative and audience testing systems that improved CTR by ~16% and reduced cost per result by ~14%
Designed live performance dashboards to guide budget reallocation and creative scaling
Worked cross-functionally with content and growth teams to roll out winning creative formats globally

intertek.title: Digital Marketing Executive
bullets: Ran paid search, paid social, and organic campaigns across South Asia for 37+ offices
Used GA4 funnel analysis and CRO tests to lift conversion rate by ~18% and MQLs by ~22%
Built and optimized landing pages, enquiry forms, and lead routing to improve sales handoff

tradebuilder.title: Digital Marketing Associate
bullets: Managed Google Ads, Meta Ads, and HubSpot campaigns for B2B lead generation
Built weekly GA4-based funnel and cohort reports that improved ad ROI by ~20%
Ran A/B tests on creatives and landing pages to increase CTR by ~12% and lower CPL

abp.title: SEO Intern
bullets: Scaled Instagram to 3,000+ and YouTube to 10,000+ followers using organic-first growth
Improved search rankings through keyword research, on-page SEO, and metadata optimization

customGpt.title: Custom GPT for Marketing Intelligence
bullets: Built a custom GPT integrating SEMrush, Ahrefs, and GA4 to automate competitor analysis, keyword research, and reporting.
Reduced manual research time and standardised insights across campaigns.

chatbot.title: Chatbot Integration for Intertek India Website
bullets: Deployed a custom chatbot on an Optimizely CMS website to capture and qualify leads across multiple business units using conditional logic.
Ran A/B tests on conversation flows and form fields to increase lead completion rates.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.subtitle: Detailed performance marketing projects and results

packt.title: Scaling Paid GTM for Events
packt.problem: Acquiring 150 paying engineers for a $100 LLM workshop with a limited $3,500 budget requires a high-efficiency GTM engine. The challenge is to identify and convert high-intent users without existing audiences, achieving >4.3x ROAS and >80% net new customers.
actions: Implemented a phased Meta Ads strategy: Learning (6 ad sets), Scale (top performers), and Retargeting
Established Tier 1 (Rev-share) and Tier 2 (Flat-fee) creator partnerships with 5K+ audiences
Executed community seeding via newsletter sponsorships and placements in GitHub, Reddit, and Discord

jrb.title: 30-Day CRO Strategy for JonesRoadBeauty.com
jrb.problem: The brand was leaking revenue across product pages, shade selection, checkout, and post-purchase flows with no internal analytics access at the start.
actions: Mapped the full funnel from PDP to post-purchase using outside-in UX and competitive research
Built hypothesis-driven test clusters for clarity, shade anxiety, first-time buyers, and checkout confidence
Sequenced tests to prioritize conversion rate before AOV or urgency
Defined guardrails and decision rules to prevent noisy or conflicting experiments

audio.title: Scaling User Acquisition for an Audio Platform
audio.problem: The platform needed to scale user acquisition while maintaining cost efficiency across highly competitive digital channels.
actions: Conducted extensive audience testing across demographics and interest segments
Optimized creative formats specifically for mobile-first consumption patterns
Ran multiple creative and placement A/B tests to isolate winners
Used Meta's learning phase and bidding controls to scale efficiently
